title: initiativeActorGroup
description: An actor group taking part in an initiative

id.description: The id of the initiative actor.

initiativeId.description: The id of the initiative the actor belongs to.

userId.description: The discord id of the user who controls the group

name.description: the name of the group of actors

initiativeResult.description: The initiative result value for the group

createdAt.description: When the initiative was first started

lastUpdatedAt.description: When the initiative was last interacted with
